ing: 1 1/2 fluid ounces sweet tea-flavored vodka (such as Jeremiah WeedÂ®)
2 fluid ounces club soda, or to taste
des: "Sweet tea vodka mixes up with lemonade in this refreshing adult variation on the Arnold Palmer. Top it off with a little soda water and garnish with a lemon wedge. It's always a favorite cocktail at Nikki's Bar in Venice Beach, California."
ins: Fill a pint glass with ice; add lemonade, vodka, and top with club soda. Garnish with lemon wedge.
